== About me ==
=== Private ===
Hi, my name is Philipp, I'm living in Dresden since 2011 and I'm studying forest science and computer science at the TU Dresden.

=== In the community ===
I'm using Linux since around 2005, starting with Mandriva, and Ubuntu in special since 2009. I'm currently contributing by filing bugs and a little bit of developing.
